H0.text: What is the astronomical term for the measure of the reflective ability of a heavenly body. Reflectivity Index

H1.text: What is the astronomical term for the measure of the reflective ability of a heavenly body. Luminosity Coefficient

H2.text: What is the astronomical term for the measure of the reflective ability of a heavenly body. Radiance Factor

H3.text: What is the astronomical term for the measure of the reflective ability of a heavenly body. Albedo

A4.text: Albedo ( al-BEE-doh; from Latin albedo 'whiteness') is the fraction of sunlight that is diffusely reflected by a body.
